title: Crafts 4 All Acrylic Paint Brushes - Pack of 18 Professional, Wide and Fine Tip, Nylon Hair Artist Paintbrushes - Paintbrush Bulk Set for Watercolor, Canvas, Craft, Detail & Oil Painting
features: Superior: If you're serious about art, you'll know an artist is only as good as their tools - which is why our paint brushes for acrylic paint come in a whole spectrum of sizes, helping you achieve the detail you deserve. Sizes include: 5/8, 8, 6, 4, 5, 3, 2, 2, 1, & 2/0.

All Mediums: Our versatile acrylic paint brushes set is actually capable of a whole lot more. Hiding their light under an acrylic bushel, our 12 pack can also be used as watercolour brushes, with oil paints, for miniature work, ceramics & even body, nail & face painting!

Design: Our acrylic brush set has been designed with short wooden handles to enable greater dexterity & control over small details. These attractive & elegant stems are between 16.5~18.5cm /6.5~7.3 inches in length, with a comfortingly smooth finish. Fine artist brushes for finesse.

Resilient: Whether designated as oil paint brushes or as a watercolour paint brush set, with rust-resistant aluminium ferrules and Nylon headed bristles, these art brushes will spring back after each stroke. Easy to clean with soap & water, the brush hair can be gently reshaped after washing.
Perfect Gift: The perfect gift for women and men that will bring a smile to their face. We know it's hard finding gifts for women and men in your lives, but look no further than Crafts 4 ALL!
description: Product Description A COMPLETE SET This set is practically a full range of paintbrushes of various sizes made for detail work. These can be used for applying fine details and embellishments as well as large coats of paint. DESIGNED FOR VERSATILITY Crafts 4 All’s 12 pc. paint brush set works well with all paint types like Watercolors, Oils, Gouache & Acrylics. It can also be used for many other crafts like Ceramics, Nail Art, Face Painting as well as miniature & model making. FOR ANY SKILL LEVEL Crafts 4 All has developed an unmatched set of paintbrushes that cater to the needs of both eager student artists as well seasoned professionals. They are also perfect for children, hobbyists as well as anyone interested in painting.
